basic.description: Distributed systems goals, characteristics, and architectures. Processes: models, inter-process communication and coordination. Name services. Consistency and replication. Fault tolerance: design for reliable communication and recovery. Security. Development paradigms based on data types: object, file, and web-based systems.
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Distributed Systems

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: ELEC 377 and registered in BSCE
